landing.title: Organize your study flow
landing.subtitle: Put an end to desperate revisions 15 minutes before your tests.
landing.early_access_landscape: Multiple languages, custom themes, dark mode (beta), and more!
landing.early_access_portrait: Multiple languages, custom themes, dark mode (beta), and more!

empty.title: It's a little empty here, huh?
empty.tasks: Add a new task with the button above to make it appear here!

scope_missing.title: Want to connect to Google Drive?
scope_missing.bold: To attach files on the platform we need access to Google Drive.
scope_missing.text: That way, we'll be able to send the attachments you choose and store them neatly in your account.

buttons.deny: No, I prefer to configure this later

error.title: Oops!
error.bold: It looks like we had an internal server problem. :(
error.text:
We are probably already working as quickly as possible to resolve this.
You can try restarting the page, but if the problem persists, please contact us directly.

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Login with your account to enjoy all the features of the platform.

no_account.title: Jeez!
no_account.subtitle:
It looks like you haven't created your account on the platform yet.
What are you waiting for? Create your account now to enjoy all the features of an estudaí account.

account_already_exists.title: Oops!
account_already_exists.bold: It looks like you already have an account on the platform.
account_already_exists.text: We've already logged you in with your Google account, so you can start using the platform right away.

section1.title: Organize your study flow.
section1.subtitle: Choose which type of course you fit in so we can prepare the platform for you.

card1.title: I'm attending elementary school
card1.subtitle: I need help reviewing core subjects

card2.title: I'm attending high school
card2.subtitle: I need help organizing schedules, remembering homework, studying for exams and staying sane

card3.title: I'm attending college
card3.subtitle: I need help with my researches, projects, thesis, etc.

section1.no_choice: I am not affiliated with any educational institution

section2.title: Create your account
section2.subtitle: Now that we know what you need, enter your Google account below to register on the platform.

google_drive.bold: We use Google Drive to store your files, so, remember to allow access to it!
google_drive.text: If access is not granted, you will be unable to upload attachments in activities.

terms.condition: By creating an account, you agree to our

section2_1.title: Creating your account
section2_1.subtitle: Don't worry, we're pressing a few buttons and turning a few handles to get your account created!

section3.title: We're ready!
section3.subtitle:
Your account has been created successfully!
Take advantage of all the features of the platform and organize your studies once and for all.

logout.title: Log out
logout.description: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?

modal1.title: Welcome to estudaí
modal1.description:
We're happy to have you here.
Here are some quick tips to make you enjoy all the features.

modal2.title: Organize your study flow
modal2.description: Save activities, tests and events on the platform to avoid any rush moments before the due date.

modal3.title: Keep up with your appointments
modal3.description: Participate and create community groups to unite those people who have the same goals as you.

modal4.title: Track the progress of your tasks
modal4.description: Tag attachments and links sent by other users in assignments and keep track of which materials you've already used.

modal5.title: Explore and enjoy
modal5.description:
estudaí is all yours.
Enjoy all the features lovingly prepared for you and good learning!
